results.content:
Rob's course revolutionized my business! He pushed me to move away from just project-based work into a retainer model that meant I had money coming in the door consistently. And THAT meant I was able to quit my full-time job almost a year before I had planned to. 

This course gave me actionable tools I could use to design my new retainers and Rob breaks the whole process down in an easy-to-understand, jargon-free way so that it was easy to implement, too.
results.content_html:
Rob's course revolutionized my business! He pushed me to move away from just project-based work into a retainer model that meant I had money coming in the door consistently. And THAT meant I was able to quit my full-time job almost a year before I had planned to.

This course gave me actionable tools I could use to design my new retainers and Rob breaks the whole process down in an easy-to-understand, jargon-free way so that it was easy to implement, too.

results.content: I've always been hesitant to offer retainers but Rob's course showed me how much sense retainers make not only for my bottom line but also for my well being. By offering retainers you can get out of that hustle mode. There are so many golden nuggets in this course like how to present it to your clients so it's a no brainer.
